mongodbDatabaseArticles.content:
One of my favorite places to eat in Granada as the food is fairly authentic, of high quality, and not expensive. A good time to visit is during lunch (3pm or so in Spain) and order plato Aapujarreno, a dish of sausage, eggs, and blood pudding. The portions are quite large so go east your first time around.
